column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I walk a few blocks from my home to the local bus stop picking up a newspaper along the way .
#text=As the bus arrives I prepare to remove money from my wallet for the fare .
#text=As the bus stops the doors open and I walk up the metal steps and stop to pay my fare to the driver .
#text=The bus is partially full but with enough seats to choose from I select a window seat .
#text=Being a warm day I open the window a crack to get a breeze on me .
#text=During my ride just out of curiosity I check out all of the other passengers before settling down to read my newspaper .
#text=I check out the local scores in the sports section first then continue to read the remainder of the paper .
#text=As the bus nears my stop I get up and walk to the exit waiting for the door to open then depart .
